      • createFromXml

        @NonNull
public static android.content.res.ColorStateList createFromXml(@NonNull
                                                                        android.content.res.Resources resources,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser parser,
                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                        android.content.res.Resources.Theme theme)
                                                                 throws org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException,
                                                                        java.io.IOException
        Creates a ColorStateList from an XML document using given a set of Resources and a Theme.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resources against which the ColorStateList should be inflated.
        parser - Parser for the XML document defining the ColorStateList.
        theme - Optional theme to apply to the color state list, may be null.
        Returns:
        A new color state list.
        Throws:
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
        java.io.IOException

      • append

        public static <T> T[] append(T[] array,
                             int currentSize,
                             T element)
        Appends an element to the end of the array, growing the array if there is no more room.
        Parameters:
        array - The array to which to append the element. This must NOT be null.
        currentSize - The number of elements in the array. Must be less than or equal to array.length.
        element - The element to append.
        Returns:
        the array to which the element was appended. This may be different than the given array.

      • append

                           int currentSize,
                           int element)
        Primitive int version of append(Object[], int, Object).

      • growSize

        public static int growSize(int currentSize)
        Given the current size of an array, returns an ideal size to which the array should grow. This is typically double the given size, but should not be relied upon to do so in the future.
